segments.text: You didn't tell me she was married !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got carried away . I made such a fool of myself . They were both laughing at me !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You got drunk , and you were hilarious . Lighten up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That guy was definitely a Don .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So now you can say you had a mafia experience . Ha-ha .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah . If I leave Little Italy alive ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you kidding ? Don had fun scaring you . He'd probably buy you dinner if we go back .
segments.speaker: S2
